name: track
label: Tracking data
description: Essential files to track persons or household over time

name: org/gross
label: Gross data
description: Information on gross sample, mostly from the field work

name: org/net
label: Original survey data (net sample)
description: Information from succesfull interviewed respondents, mostly based on a questionnaire

name: survey
label: Method data
description: Dataset describing the survey design or weighting scheme

name: gen
label: Generated data
description: Generated data, checked for longitudinally consistency

name: gen/bio
label: Gen. Biographical data
description: Generated biographical data, checked for longitudinally consistency
